name: Bench Press
description: A compound exercise that targets the chest, shoulders, and triceps. Performed using a barbell or dumbbells on a flat bench.

name: Squat
description: A fundamental lower-body exercise that strengthens the quadriceps, hamstrings, and glutes by lowering and raising the body from a squat position.

name: Deadlift
description: A full-body movement that primarily targets the lower back, hamstrings, and glutes by lifting a weighted barbell from the floor.

name: Pull-Up
description: A bodyweight exercise that targets the upper back and biceps by pulling the body up to a bar until the chin is above it.

name: Shoulder Press
description: A pressing movement that strengthens the deltoids and triceps by pushing a weight overhead.

name: Bicep Curl
description: An isolation exercise that targets the biceps by curling a dumbbell or barbell toward the shoulders.

name: Tricep Dips
description: A bodyweight exercise that targets the triceps by lowering and raising the body using parallel bars.

name: Lunges
description: A unilateral leg exercise that improves balance and strength by stepping forward and lowering the body before returning to the start position.

name: Plank
description: An isometric core exercise that strengthens the abs, lower back, and shoulders by holding a push-up position for time.

name: Russian Twists
description: A rotational core exercise that targets the obliques by twisting the torso from side to side while seated.
